description: Chronological incident notes capturing dispatch updates, safety alerts, on-scene reports, EMS updates, resource updates, and command decisions across all active incidents.

records.seo_content: All companies dispatched. 3rd alarm sounded at 08:25. Additional units responding.
Lightweight truss roof construction confirmed. NO interior operations above 1st floor. Collapse zone established.
All 120 residents evacuated and accounted for. Search complete on floors 1-3. No injuries.
Transitioning to defensive operations. All personnel out of structure. Master streams in operation from Division Alpha and Bravo positions.
MCI declared. 7 patients confirmed. Triage officer assigned. Additional ambulances requested.
Triage complete: 2 Red, 3 Yellow, 2 Green. 1 patient entrapped in vehicle 2. Extrication in progress.
County mutual aid requested. City EMS providing 2 additional medic units.
Chlorine release confirmed. Hot zone 200m radius from loading dock. Warm zone 200-500m. All personnel in hot zone require Level A protection.
Source identified: 500 lb chlorine tank with mechanical failure on valve. Leak rate approximately 5 lbs/hour.
Leak contained with emergency valve kit. Decon corridor operational. Beginning atmospheric monitoring for zone reduction.
Approximately 2 acres involved. Fire spreading northeast with wind. No structures threatened within 1/4 mile.
Fire contained at 2.5 acres. Perimeter secure. Mop-up operations beginning.
